ui.panel.page-onboarding.intro: Are you ready to awaken your home, reclaim your privacy and join a worldwide community of tinkerers?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.intro: Let's get started by creating a user account.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.data.name: Name
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: Hello {name}, welcome to ioBroker. How would you like to name your home?
Gustaríanos saber onde vives. Esta información axudará a amosar información e configurar automatismos baseados no sol. Estes datos nunca se comparten fóra da túa rede.
We can help you fill in this information by making a one-time request to an external service.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.int: Devices and services are represented in ioBroker as integrations. You can set them up now, or do it later from the configuration screen.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.intro: Comparte análises desde a túa instancia. Estes datos estarán dispoñibles publicamente en {link}
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.descrip: Alternatively you can restore from a previous snapshot.
